definition: feudal way of thinking
surname Feng
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to think/to consider
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: The movement was badly influenced by the thought of petty bourgeoisie and the left thought of feudalism.
sentences.chinese: 第三，小資產階級思想和封建思想殘餘的嚴重影響。

sentences.english: Looking down on women is part of feudal ideology.
sentences.chinese: 輕視婦女是封建思想的一部分。

sentences.english: Feudal ideas were stamped on her mind.
sentences.chinese: 封建思想在她頭腦中根深蒂固。

sentences.english: It is really out of imagination that their thoughts are so deeply rooted in feudalism.
sentences.chinese: 沒想到他們的封建思想是那樣的頑固不化。

sentences.english: Many people were short of innovative spirits and adhered to the feudal ideas.
sentences.chinese: 許多人都是相當短的創新肉體，堅持以封建思想。

definition: system of enfeoffment/feudalism/feudal/feudalistic
to regard men as superior to women (idiom)
to value males and attach less importance to females (idiom)
forced marriage/arranged marriage (without the consent of the individuals)
feudal society

three principles and five virtues (idiom)/the three rules (ruler guides subject, father guides son and husband guides wife) and five constant virtues of Confucianism (benevolence 仁, righteousness 義|义, propriety 禮|礼, wisdom 智 and fidelity 信)
feudalism
feudalism

Confucian moral injunctions for women, namely: obey in turn three men father, husband and son, plus the four virtues of morality 德, physical charm 容, propriety in speech 言 and efficiency in needlework 功
a woman's virtue is to have no talent (idiom)
pinyin: nu:3 zi3 wu2 cai2 bian4 shi4 de2

definition: Confucian code of ethics
feudal times
authority over the household
the teaching of Confucius and Mencius
Confucian thoughts/the thinking of the Confucian school
equality of the sexes
